com.topcoder.commons.utils

类 LoggingWrapperUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.topcoder.commons.utils.LoggingWrapperUtility

  • public class LoggingWrapperUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a utility class that provides static methods for logging method entrance, method exit and exception using Logging Wrapper component. It allows to optionally log method input/output parameters, method execution time and timestamps. Exceptions are logged together with stack traces. Default level for method entrance/exit message is DEBUG, for exceptions - ERROR; but both can be overridden. Thread Safety: This class is immutable and thread safe when array parameters passed to it are used by the caller in thread safe manner.
    作者:
    yangxuelian

    • 方法详细资料

      • logEntrance

        public static void logEntrance(Log log,
                               java.lang.String signature,
                               java.lang.String[] paramNames,
                               java.lang.Object[] paramValues)
        Logs the method entrance together with input parameters (if present). It's assumed that paramNames and paramValues contain the same number of elements. When this method is used, timestamp is not logged explicitly and DEBUG level is used.
        参数:
        paramNames - the names of input parameters (null of method doesn't accept any parameters)
        paramValues - the values of input parameters
        log - the logger to be used (null if logging is not required to be performed)
        signature - the signature that uniquely identifies the method (e.g. className#methodName)

      • logEntrance

        public static void logEntrance(Log log,
                               java.lang.String signature,
                               java.lang.String[] paramNames,
                               java.lang.Object[] paramValues,
                               boolean addTimestamp,
                               Level level)
        Logs the method entrance together with input parameters (if present) and timestamp (optionally). It's assumed that paramNames and paramValues contain the same number of elements.
        参数:
        paramNames - the names of input parameters (null of method doesn't accept any parameters)
        paramValues - the values of input parameters
        log - the logger to be used (null if logging is not required to be performed)
        signature - the signature that uniquely identifies the method (e.g. className#methodName)
        addTimestamp - true if timestamp must be added to the logged message, false otherwise
        level - the logging level to be used

      • logExit

        public static void logExit(Log log,
                           java.lang.String signature,
                           java.lang.Object[] value)
        Logs the method exit together with the returned value (if present). When this method is used, timestamp is not logged explicitly, method execution time is not logged and DEBUG level is used.
        参数:
        log - the logger to be used (null if logging is not required to be performed)
        signature - the signature that uniquely identifies the method (e.g. className#methodName)
        value - the value returned from the method (should contain 1 element with the returned value, or should be null if the method returns void)

      • logExit

        public static void logExit(Log log,
                           java.lang.String signature,
                           java.lang.Object[] value,
                           java.util.Date entranceTimestamp)
        Logs the method exit together with the returned value (if present) and method execution time. When this method is used, timestamp is not logged explicitly and DEBUG level is used.
        参数:
        entranceTimestamp - the method entrance timestamp (null if not available), is used for calculating method execution time
        log - the logger to be used (null if logging is not required to be performed)
        signature - the signature that uniquely identifies the method (e.g. className#methodName)
        value - the value returned from the method (should contain 1 element with the returned value, or should be null if the method returns void)

      • logExit

        public static void logExit(Log log,
                           java.lang.String signature,
                           java.lang.Object[] value,
                           java.util.Date entranceTimestamp,
                           boolean addTimestamp,
                           Level level)
        Logs the method exit together with the returned value (if present) and method execution time.
        参数:
        entranceTimestamp - the method entrance timestamp (null if not available), is used for calculating method execution time
        log - the logger to be used (null if logging is not required to be performed)
        signature - the signature that uniquely identifies the method (e.g. className#methodName)
        addTimestamp - true if timestamp must be added to the logged message, false otherwise
        level - the logging level to be used
        value - the value returned from the method (should contain 1 element with the returned value, or should be null if the method returns void)

      • logException

        public static <T extends java.lang.Throwable> T logException(Log log,
                                                             java.lang.String signature,
                                                             T exception)
        Logs the given exception. When this method is used, timestamp is not logged explicitly and ERROR level is used.
        参数:
        exception - the exception to be logged (assumed to be not null)
        log - the logger to be used (null if logging is not required to be performed)
        signature - the signature that uniquely identifies the method (e.g. className#methodName) where the exception is logged
        返回:
        the logged exception

      • logException

        public static <T extends java.lang.Throwable> T logException(Log log,
                                                             java.lang.String signature,
                                                             T exception,
                                                             boolean addTimestamp,
                                                             Level level)
        Logs the given exception together with timestamp (optionally).
        参数:
        exception - the exception to be logged (assumed to be not null)
        log - the logger to be used (null if logging is not required to be performed)
        signature - the signature that uniquely identifies the method (e.g. className#methodName) where the exception is logged
        addTimestamp - true if timestamp must be added to the logged message, false otherwise
        level - the logging level to be used
        返回:
        the logged exception
